Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates Stacey Abrams' position on giving illegal aliens the right to vote.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Stacey Abrams did not advocate for undocumented immigrants to cast ballots.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to substantiate the accusation made against Stacey Abrams.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Stacey Abrams wants to give illegal aliens the right to vote based on a misinterpretation of her statement.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that Stacey Abrams was referring to the diversity of her supporters rather than advocating for illegal aliens to vote.
